message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $20,000, which reflects its true worth.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $10,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is significantly below its value. I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am still aiming to keep my investment within $10,000. Could we possibly negotiate the price down to $15,000?
